attributes.action: Prohibit by law and punish by imprisonment any form of sexual quizzing in any public means.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prohibit by law and punish by imprisonment any form of unsolicited sexual quizzing by way of any public means.

rejection.details: It is unclear exactly what you are asking people to support.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
